resources.string: Octopus Trivia
What do you know about the octopus?
Answer each question below and click \"Check Me!\" to submit your answers.
An octopus has three hearts
True
False
The plural form of the word octopus is
octopodes
octopi
octopuses
Which of the following is(are) true about the octopus?
The octopus has eight tentacles
The octopus can smell with its arms
Severed arms can jerk away in pain when researches pinch them
Like starfish, a severed octopus arm can regrow another octopus
The octopus is the most intelligent invertebrate, and has been known to
open jars from the inside out
overpower lab assistants and tie them up with rope
build electric cars on the assembly line
build rock fortresses to protect themselves while they sleep
No, technically they have 8 arms with suckers along most of their length. Tentacles only have suckers on the ends.
No, but that would be cool! It can regrow an arm, but not an entire octopus.
No, but they have been known to recognize and shoot water at people they didn\'t like!
No, but they have been known to make tools out of coconuts!
Good job!
Optional: What color would your pet octopus be??
Example: purple
Check Me!
